backgrounds.name: Acolyte
backgrounds.description: You have spent your life in the service of a temple to a specific god or pantheon of gods. You act as an intermediary between the realm of the holy and the mortal world.

backgrounds.name: Anthropologist
backgrounds.description: You have studied many different cultures, learning to appreciate the diversity of beliefs, traditions, and practices that people adhere to.

backgrounds.name: Archaeologist
backgrounds.description: You seek out and study the ruins and artifacts of lost civilizations, helping to recover ancient knowledge and treasures.

backgrounds.name: Athlete
backgrounds.description: You have trained and competed at an athletic event or sport, specializing in a specific physical ability, which you have perfected through rigorous discipline.

backgrounds.name: Charlatan
backgrounds.description: You have always had a way with people, convincing them to trust you while selling them lies and empty promises. You're a master of deception and trickery.

backgrounds.name: City Watch
backgrounds.description: You have served as a watchman or law enforcement officer in a major city, keeping the peace and upholding local laws.

backgrounds.name: Clan Crafter
backgrounds.description: You are a skilled artisan who trained within a dwarf clan, crafting items of exceptional quality, with a strong sense of tradition and duty.

backgrounds.name: Cloistered Scholar
backgrounds.description: You have lived a life of scholarship, spending your days in libraries or at the feet of learned teachers, acquiring vast knowledge.

backgrounds.name: Courtier
backgrounds.description: You have served in the court of a noble or royalty, learning the ways of diplomacy, politics, and etiquette.

backgrounds.name: Criminal
backgrounds.description: You have a history of breaking the law and living by your wits, evading authorities while pulling off heists or schemes.

backgrounds.name: Entertainer
backgrounds.description: You are a performer at heart, using your talents to captivate audiences, whether through music, storytelling, acrobatics, or acting.

backgrounds.name: Faceless
backgrounds.description: You operate from behind a mask or persona, concealing your true identity while fighting for a cause or seeking justice in secret.

backgrounds.name: Faction Agent
backgrounds.description: You belong to a faction dedicated to a specific cause, serving their interests with unwavering loyalty and commitment.

backgrounds.name: Far Traveler
backgrounds.description: You have traveled to distant lands, exploring new cultures, landscapes, and customs far removed from your own.

backgrounds.name: Feylost
backgrounds.description: You were once lost in the Feywild, and now you carry its strange magic and influence with you in the mortal world.

backgrounds.name: Fisher
backgrounds.description: You have spent much of your life fishing, either for survival or as a profession, developing skills to read the waters and weather.

backgrounds.name: Folk Hero
backgrounds.description: You are a champion of the common people, having risen from humble beginnings to stand against tyranny or injustice.

backgrounds.name: Giant Foundling
backgrounds.description: Raised by giants or within their culture, you possess great strength and knowledge of their ways.

backgrounds.name: Gladiator
backgrounds.description: You have fought in arenas for the entertainment of others, becoming a deadly combatant honed by the harsh life of a warrior.

backgrounds.name: Guild Artisan
backgrounds.description: You are a member of a respected guild, using your craft to earn a living and a reputation as a skilled tradesperson.

backgrounds.name: Guild Merchant
backgrounds.description: You belong to a guild of traders, using your wits and bargaining skills to secure valuable goods and profitable deals.

backgrounds.name: Haunted One
backgrounds.description: You have faced unimaginable horrors, which left you scarred, both physically and mentally. You are driven by a need to confront your fears or atone for past deeds.

backgrounds.name: Hermit
backgrounds.description: You lived in seclusion, away from society, seeking inner peace, spiritual guidance, or hiding from the world.

backgrounds.name: House Agent
backgrounds.description: You represent one of the great noble houses, acting as their agent and carrying out their will in matters of business or politics.

backgrounds.name: Inheritor
backgrounds.description: You are the heir to a special legacyâ€”whether it's an artifact, a secret, or a mission passed down to you by your ancestors.

backgrounds.name: Investigator
backgrounds.description: You are trained in solving mysteries, using a combination of observation, logic, and intuition to uncover hidden truths.

backgrounds.name: Knight
backgrounds.description: You are a member of a noble order of warriors, bound by honor and duty to protect the weak and uphold chivalry.

backgrounds.name: Knight of the Order
backgrounds.description: You serve a holy order or organization dedicated to a particular cause, protecting its interests and leading its forces.

backgrounds.name: Marine
backgrounds.description: You are a hardened soldier who has spent time aboard ships, fighting battles both at sea and on land.

backgrounds.name: Mercenary Veteran
backgrounds.description: You have served as a soldier-for-hire, fighting for the highest bidder, with a wealth of experience in warfare.

backgrounds.name: Noble
backgrounds.description: You are born to a noble family, having been raised in wealth and privilege, with a keen understanding of politics and social dynamics.

backgrounds.name: Outlander
backgrounds.description: You have spent your life in the wilderness, surviving through your knowledge of nature and your resourcefulness.

backgrounds.name: Pirate
backgrounds.description: You lived the life of a buccaneer, raiding ships and plundering the seas, with a code of freedom and adventure.

backgrounds.name: Rewarded
backgrounds.description: You have earned the favor of a noble or ruler, and now you live a life of luxury thanks to their generosity.

backgrounds.name: Ruined
backgrounds.description: Your past has been marred by great personal loss or failure, but you survive, driven by a burning desire to reclaim what was taken.

backgrounds.name: Rune Carver
backgrounds.description: You have mastered the ancient art of rune magic, inscribing powerful symbols into objects or onto the battlefield.

backgrounds.name: Sage
backgrounds.description: You have devoted your life to scholarly pursuits, seeking knowledge in books, scrolls, and ancient texts.

backgrounds.name: Sailor
backgrounds.description: You have spent your life at sea, learning the ways of ships, navigation, and the unpredictable nature of the ocean.

backgrounds.name: Shipwright
backgrounds.description: You are skilled in the construction and repair of ships, understanding the intricate craft that keeps them seaworthy.

backgrounds.name: Smuggler
backgrounds.description: You have a talent for moving goods and people across borders, evading authorities and bypassing laws to make a profit.

backgrounds.name: Soldier
backgrounds.description: You have served in a military force, honing your skills in battle and discipline through service and command.

backgrounds.name: Spy
backgrounds.description: You specialize in gathering information and infiltrating enemy forces, using subterfuge and deception to achieve your objectives.

backgrounds.name: Urchin
backgrounds.description: You grew up on the streets, learning to fend for yourself in the harsh environment of a bustling city.
